message: Let's make a deal. This offer heavily favors me, but it's better for you than to let the money devalue further.
I propose a more equitable split. Let's avoid further devaluation and share the wealth more fairly.
Time is money, Bob. Literally. This offer is my compromise - let's end this before your share shrinks any further.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile for me.  Let's reach a deal before the inflation eats away at our gains even more.
